_help_OPENAI_API_BASE: Endpoint value from doc, Check out Azure guide if you dont know: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/openai/quickstart?tabs=command-line&pivots=programming-language-python
_help_OPENAI_API_KEY: Value generated through AZURE portal, refer same link as that of OpenAI_API_BASE
_help_DOCKER_NAMESPACE: Edit only if you wish to use your own Docker image
